A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Best in the saga? I'm on my way to thinking so. The plot was simple\, but that is always the case with Star Wars movies - they are about the characters and relationships between them. 

Luke's characterization makes sense after 30 years and the dynamic between him and Rey reminds me of him and Yoda. 

Adam Driver stole every scene he was in and convinced me of how complex a villain Kylo Ren really is.
